#H0: mu = 1
#HA: mu != 1

mu0 <- 1
x_bar <- 0.9975
stdev <- 0.012
n <- 120


z <- (x_bar - mu0)/(sqrt(stdev*2/n)) 
paste0(\z = \"

p_value <- 2 * pnorm(z)
p_value <- round(p_value, 3)

# calculating 95% C.I.
z_critical <- qnorm(0.975)

ci <- c(
  x_bar - z_critical * sqrt(stdev^2/n), 
  x_bar + z_critical * sqrt(stdev^2/n)
)
